terms.definition: Confidentiality is the state of keeping information secret or private, often legally protected by an agreement that restricts its disclosure.
Governing Law is the specific set of laws of a particular jurisdiction that will be applied to interpret and enforce the terms of a contract.
This formal concluding phrase in a contract, meaning 'as proof of this agreement,' usually precedes the signatures of the parties.
An Independent Contractor Agreement is a legal contract that outlines the terms and conditions between a client and a self-employed individual or company performing services.
In contracts, 'NOW' often serves as a formal transition, usually followed by 'THEREFORE,' to move from the background statements to the specific agreements and promises.

The Relationship of the Parties section in a contract specifies the legal connection between those involved, such as independent contractor, employer-employee, or partners, to clarify their respective rights and obligations.
Social Security contributions are mandatory payments made by employees and employers to fund the Social Security system, which provides retirement, disability, and survivor benefits.
In a contract, 'THEREFORE' is a formal word used to introduce the main operative clauses and mutual agreements, following the background 'WHEREAS' clauses.
In a contract, 'WHEREAS' is a formal introductory word used to present background information, context, or reasons for entering into the agreement.
The term 'aforesaid' refers to something that has already been mentioned or stated earlier in the same document.
An agent is a person or entity authorized to act on behalf of another party (the principal) in business or legal matters.
This emphatic phrase means 'all,' emphasizing that every single item or instance, without exception, is included.
This phrase is used to identify the two primary parties who are entering into or forming an agreement.
A choice of law provision in a contract is an agreement between the parties specifying which jurisdiction's laws will be used to resolve any disputes.
Conflict of law provisions are clauses in a contract that specify which jurisdiction's laws will apply if a legal dispute arises involving multiple legal systems.
This phrase refers to the specific date that is stated at the very beginning or top of the legal document.
This phrase means that an action or effect can occur either through a primary, immediate involvement or through an intermediary, third party, or secondary connection.
Disability insurance is a type of insurance that provides income replacement to individuals who are unable to work due to illness or injury.
To disclose means to reveal, make known, or share information that was previously private or secret.
This phrase refers to the entire period during which the services are being provided or the working relationship defined by the agreement is active.

terms.term: during the term of this Agreement or at any time thereafter
terms.definition: This phrase means that a condition or obligation applies throughout the entire period the agreement is active and continues even after it formally ends.
An employee is an individual hired by an employer to perform work or services, typically under the employer's direct control and supervision, in exchange for wages.
To be 'entitled to' something means to have a legal right or valid claim to receive it.

terms.term: except as required in the course of this engagement
terms.definition: This clause means that a general prohibition or rule does not apply if performing the specified duties or tasks under the agreement makes an exception necessary.
When a document is executed, it has been properly signed by all parties, making it legally valid and effective.
When something is 'expressly understood,' it means it has been clearly and explicitly stated, agreed upon, or acknowledged, leaving no room for doubt.

terms.term: governed by and construed in accordance with
terms.definition: This phrase specifies that the contract's interpretation and legal enforcement will follow the laws and legal principles of a particular named jurisdiction.
The term 'herein' means 'in this document,' 'in this agreement,' or 'in this instrument.'
This legal phrase means 'in exchange for' or 'in return for,' referring to the value or benefit each party provides to the other in a contract.
An independent contractor is a self-employed person or business hired to perform work or services for another entity under a contract, without being an employee.
Innovations are new methods, ideas, products, or processes that are introduced, often as an improvement or solution to existing ones.
Inventions refer to new and original creations, processes, or devices that result from an individual's or group's intellectual effort, often capable of being patented.
A joint venturer is a person or entity involved in a temporary business undertaking with another party, sharing the risks, profits, and management for a specific project.

terms.term: made and entered into as of
terms.definition: This phrase formally states the specific date on which the agreement legally becomes effective between the parties.
Mutual covenants and promises are the reciprocal agreements and commitments that each party makes to the other within a contract, forming the basis of their exchange.
In a business context, a partner is a person or entity who shares in a business venture with another, typically sharing risks, responsibilities, and profits.
Payroll type taxes are taxes that employers are legally required to withhold from employee wages and/or contribute themselves, such as income tax, Social Security, and Medicare.
The principal place of business is the primary physical location where a company's executive offices are located and where its main business operations are conducted.
Processes are a series of systematic actions, steps, or methods undertaken to achieve a particular result or outcome.
Satisfactory completion means that a task, project, or service has been finished to an acceptable standard or as specified in the agreement.
To be solely responsible for something means to have the exclusive duty, obligation, or accountability for a particular task, outcome, or liability.
Trade secrets are confidential business information, such as formulas, practices, designs, or compilations of information, that give a company a competitive economic advantage.
Unemployment taxes are funds paid by employers to state and federal governments to finance unemployment insurance benefits for eligible workers who lose their jobs.
This phrase means that a specific action or event will occur only after a formal, documented notification has been delivered in writing.
